name: The Hack (Tsociety)
description: You play as a boy who is an middle school and has the ability to SAVE and LOAD savestates being a character controlled by the player. However a mysterious entity is messing with the game files and as you play, he gains more control over the system. You have to make one of two decisions, to make peace with it, or to defeat it  in a Capture The Flag, with the flag being the program. The character sprites are made in gatcha life as I can't draw the sprites.
